meanings.definition: A title of the former monarch of Iran.
meanings.sent1: The shah of Iran was a powerful leader.
meanings.sent2: The people celebrated the coronation of the shah.
meanings.sent3: The shah decided to wear a crown made of flowers.
meanings.sent4: In the chess game of politics, he moved like a shah.
meanings.sent5: The image of the shah riding a golden chariot was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A ruler in certain Middle Eastern countries.
meanings.sent1: The wise shah governed his kingdom with fairness.
meanings.sent2: The people gathered to hear the shah's decree.
meanings.sent3: The shah's pet parrot mimicked his royal commands.
meanings.sent4: The shah's influence spread like a desert wind.
meanings.sent5: The shah's palace gleamed in the desert sun.

meanings.definition: A chess piece that moves one square in any direction.
meanings.sent1: The player moved the shah diagonally across the board.
meanings.sent2: Capturing the opponent's shah led to victory.
meanings.sent3: The shah piece stood tall among the pawns.
meanings.sent4: The shah's strategic position protected the king.
meanings.sent5: The shah's movement was limited but crucial in the game.
